summary: THE DRIVE TRAIN WAS DEFECTIVE, WHEN THE VEHICLE REACHED A SPEED OF 70 MPH IT LOST POWER AND HAD BECOME UNCONTROLLABLE.  *JB  THERE WAS A SLIPPAGE IN THE  DRIVE TRAIN, MADE EXCESSIVE NOISE WHEN SHIFTING UP OR DOWN, AND IS EASY TO COME APART.  ON SEVERAL OCCASIONS, THE TRANSMISSION APPEARED TO LOSE CONTACT WITH THE REAR END.  (ALT NO. FOR THE CONSUMER DAYTIME IS:  334-301-9766)  SCC
